files.file: interface eth0 ip address 10.0.3.2/24 ipv6 address a:3::2/64 ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.5.1/24 ipv6 address a:5::1/64 ! router ospf router-id 10.0.3.2 network 10.0.3.0/24 area 0 network 10.0.5.0/24 area 0 ! router ospf6 router-id 10.0.3.2 interface eth0 area 0.0.0.0 interface eth1 area 0.0.0.0 !

#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by SSH service (utility.py) ssh-keygen -q -t rsa -N "" -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key chmod 655 /var/run/sshd # wait until RSA host key has been generated to launch sshd /usr/sbin/sshd -f /etc/ssh/sshd_config

# auto-generated by SSH service (utility.py) Port 22 Protocol 2 HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key UsePrivilegeSeparation yes PidFile /var/run/sshd/sshd.pid
KeyRegenerationInterval 3600 ServerKeyBits 768
SyslogFacility AUTH LogLevel INFO
LoginGraceTime 120 PermitRootLogin yes StrictModes yes
RSAAuthentication yes PubkeyAuthentication yes
IgnoreRhosts yes RhostsRSAAuthentication no HostbasedAuthentication no
PermitEmptyPasswords no ChallengeResponseAuthentication no
X11Forwarding yes X11DisplayOffset 10 PrintMotd no PrintLastLog yes TCPKeepAlive yes
AcceptEnv LANG LC_* Subsystem sftp /usr/lib/openssh/sftp-server UsePAM yes UseDNS no
